name: df-lfig
body: |- wceq(clfig, crab(s0, clmod, wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cima(cfv(clspn, cv(s0)), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cfn)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ LFinGen = { s0 ∈ LMod |(Base ` s0)∈((LSpan ` s0)"(P((Base ` s0))⋂ Fin))}
comment: Define the class of finitely generated left modules. Finite generation of subspaces can be intepreted using ` |``s ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
